@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@

+
+'use strict';
+
+angular.module('SyncopeEnduserApp').
+        directive('validationMessage', function () {
+          return {
+            templateUrl: 'views/validationMessage.html',
+            scope: {
+              "name": "@"
+            },
+            link: function (scope, el, attrs) {              
+              //listener
+              scope.$on(attrs.name, function (el, errors) {
+                scope.errors = errors;               
+              });
+            }
+          };
+        });
